information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/dotnet/csharp-tmLanguage/blob/master/grammars/csharp.tmLanguage
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
Once accepted there, we are happy to receive an update request.
name: C#

delegate-declaration.begin:
(?x)
(?:\b(delegate)\b)\s+
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:ref\s+(?:readonly\s+)?)?   # ref return
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*
        (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
      )
      (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
      (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)\s+
(\g<identifier>)\s*
(<([^<>]+)>)?\s*
(?=\()

field-declaration.begin:
(?x)
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*
        (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
      )
      (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
      (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)\s+
(\g<identifier>)\s* # first field name
(?!=>|==)(?=,|;|=|$)

property-declaration.begin:
(?x)

# The negative lookahead below ensures that we don't match nested types
# or other declarations as properties.
(?![[:word:][:space:]]*\b(?:class|interface|struct|enum|event)\b)

(?<return-type>
  (?<type-name>
    (?:
      (?:ref\s+(?:readonly\s+)?)?   # ref return
      (?:
        (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
        (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
          \g<identifier>\s*
          (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
        )
        (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
        (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
      )
      (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
      (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
    )
  )\s+
)
(?<interface-name>\g<type-name>\s*\.\s*)?
(?<property-name>\g<identifier>)\s*
(?=\{|=>|$)

indexer-declaration.begin:
(?x)
(?<return-type>
  (?<type-name>
    (?:
      (?:ref\s+(?:readonly\s+)?)?   # ref return
      (?:
        (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
        (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
          \g<identifier>\s*
          (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
        )
        (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
        (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
      )
      (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
      (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
    )
  )\s+
)
(?<interface-name>\g<type-name>\s*\.\s*)?
(?<indexer-name>this)\s*
(?=\[)

event-declaration.begin:
(?x)
\b(event)\b\s*
(?<return-type>
  (?<type-name>
    (?:
      (?:
        (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
        (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
          \g<identifier>\s*
          (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
        )
        (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
        (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
      )
      (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
      (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
    )
  )\s+
)
(?<interface-name>\g<type-name>\s*\.\s*)?
(?<event-names>\g<identifier>(?:\s*,\s*\g<identifier>)*)\s*
(?=\{|;|$)

method-declaration.begin:
(?x)
(?<return-type>
  (?<type-name>
    (?:
      (?:ref\s+(?:readonly\s+)?)?   # ref return
      (?:
        (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification

)
(?<interface-name>\g<type-name>\s*\.\s*)?
(\g<identifier>)\s*
(<([^<>]+)>)?\s*
(?=\()

operator-declaration.begin:
(?x)
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:ref\s+(?:readonly\s+)?)?   # ref return
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*
        (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
      )
      (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?

    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)\s*
(?<operator-keyword>(?:\b(?:operator)))\s*
(?<operator>(?:\+|-|\*|/|%|&|\||\^|\<\<|\>\>|==|!=|\>|\<|\>=|\<=|!|~|\+\+|--|true|false))\s*
(?=\()

conversion-operator-declaration.begin:
(?x)
(?<explicit-or-implicit-keyword>(?:\b(?:explicit|implicit)))\s*
(?<operator-keyword>(?:\b(?:operator)))\s*
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:ref\s+(?:readonly\s+)?)?   # ref return
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*

    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)\s*
(?=\()

patterns.match:
(?x)
(?:
  (\bvar\b)|
  (?<type-name>
    (?:
      (?:
        (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
        (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
          \g<identifier>\s*
          (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
        )
        (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
        (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
      )
      (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
      (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
    )
  )
)\s+
(\g<identifier>)\s+
\b(in)\b

(?x)
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*
        (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
      )
      (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
      (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)\s*
(?:(\g<identifier>)\b)?

local-variable-declaration.begin:
(?x)
(?:
  (?:(\bref)\s+(?:(\breadonly)\s+)?)?(\bvar\b)| # ref local
  (?<type-name>
    (?:
      (?:ref\s+(?:readonly\s+)?)?   # ref local
      (?:
        (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
        (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
          \g<identifier>\s*
          (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
        )
        (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
        (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
      )
      (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
      (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
    )
  )
)\s+
(\g<identifier>)\s*
(?=,|;|=|\))

local-constant-declaration.begin:
(?x)
(?<const-keyword>\b(?:const)\b)\s*
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*
        (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
      )
      (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?

    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)\s+
(\g<identifier>)\s*
(?=,|;|=)

declaration-expression-local.match:
(?x) # e.g. int x OR var x
(?:
  \b(var)\b|
  (?<type-name>
    (?:
      (?:
        (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
        (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
          \g<identifier>\s*
          (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
        )
        (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
        (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
      )
      (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
      (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
    )
  )
)\s+
(\g<identifier>)\b\s*
(?=[,)\]])

declaration-expression-tuple.match:
(?x) # e.g. int x OR var x
(?:
  \b(var)\b|
  (?<type-name>
    (?:
      (?:
        (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
        (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
          \g<identifier>\s*
          (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
        )
        (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?

      )
      (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
      (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
    )
  )
)\s+
(\g<identifier>)\b\s*
(?=[,)])

cast-expression.match:
(?x)
(\()\s*
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*
        (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
      )
      (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
      (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)\s*
(\))(?=\s*@?[_[:alnum:]\(])

as-expression.match:
(?x)
(?<!\.)\b(as)\b\s*
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*
        (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
      )
      (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
      (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)?

is-expression.match:
(?x)
(?<!\.)\b(is)\b\s*
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*
        (?<type-args>\s*<(?:[^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?
      )
      (?:\s*\.\s*\g<name-and-type-args>)* | # Are there any more names being dotted into?
      (?<tuple>\s*\((?:[^\(\)]|\g<tuple>)+\))
    )
    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?
  )
)?

invocation-expression.begin:
(?x)
(?:(\?)\s*)?                                     # preceding null-conditional operator?
(?:(\.)\s*)?                                     # preceding dot?
(@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*                   # method name
(?<type-args>\s*<([^<>]|\g<type-args>)+>\s*)?\s* # type arguments
(?=\()                                           # open paren of argument list

element-access-expression.begin:
(?x)
(?:(\?)\s*)?                        # preceding null-conditional operator?
(?:(\.)\s*)?                        # preceding dot?
(?:(@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*)? # property name
(?:(\?)\s*)?                        # null-conditional operator?
(?=\[)                              # open bracket of argument list

patterns.match:
(?x)
(?:(\?)\s*)?                   # preceding null-conditional operator?
(\.)\s*                        # preceding dot
(@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s* # property name
(?![_[:alnum:]]|\(|(\?)?\[|<)  # next character is not alpha-numeric, nor a (, [, or <. Also, test for ?[

object-creation-expression-with-paramete.begin:
(?x)
(new)\s+
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)

    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?

  )
)\s*
(?=\()

(?x)
(new)\s+
(?<type-name>

)\s*
(?=\{|$)

array-creation-expression.begin:
(?x)
\b(new|stackalloc)\b\s*
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)

)?\s*
(?=\[)

parameter.match:
(?x)
(?:(?:\b(ref|params|out|in|this)\b)\s+)?
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:ref\s+)?   # ref return
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)

    (?:\s*\?\s*)? # nullable suffix?
    (?:\s*\[(?:\s*,\s*)*\]\s*)* # array suffix?

)\s+
(\g<identifier>)

query-expression.begin:
(?x)
\b(from)\b\s*
(?<type-name>
  (?:

)?
\s+(\g<identifier>)\b\s*
\b(in)\b\s*

join-clause.begin:

lambda-parameter.match:
(?x)
(?:\b(ref|out|in)\b)?\s*
(?:(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)

(\g<identifier>)\b\s*
(?=[,)])

tuple-element.match:
(?x)
(?<type-name>
  (?:
    (?:
      (?:(?<identifier>@?[_[:alpha:]][_[:alnum:]]*)\s*\:\:\s*)? # alias-qualification
      (?<name-and-type-args> # identifier + type arguments (if any)
        \g<identifier>\s*

(?:(?<tuple-name>\g<identifier>)\b)?
